video_prompt: Young woman's head rotates slowly, eyes subtly shift gaze. Her teal hair gently cascades and sways. Fabric ripples softly as a faint breeze touches her. Faint background elements subtly appear and recede. Lighting subtly undulates, creating shifting shadows and highlights.
image_prompt: Anime-style digital painting, medium close-up of a young woman with teal hair styled in a bun and braids, black bow with red stripes in hair, light blue eyes with black eyeliner, orange blush, nude lips, subtle freckles. She wears a black choker with gold charms and ornate gold earrings. Dressed in a flowy white high-collar long-sleeved shirt with a black bow. Soft lighting against a bright white background with faint grayish electrical wires on the right. Shy, intriguing demeanor, ethereal beauty.
refined_video_prompt: Her head slowly rotates, eyes subtly shifting gaze. Hair gently cascades and sways. Fabric ripples softly as a faint breeze touches her. Background elements subtly appear and recede. Lighting undulates, creating shifting shadows and highlights across her.
